data.title: Local Time in Pula, Croatia
data.meta_description: Local date and time in Pula, Croatia with local time name, offset, day length and Daylight-saving time if Pula uses it or not, Listing the difference in time between Pula local time and the time in the world major cities
data.text:
Daylight Saving Time in Pula

On Sunday, March 31, 2024, daylight saving time was already implemented by changing the time with 01:00 Spring forward, and the next change in daylight saving time will be on Sunday, October 27, 2024, by chainging the time 01:00 Fall back.

Daylight Saving Time 2022
